Address.label: Address
Address.value: 650 CALIFORNIA STREET, SAN FRANCISCO, California, 94108, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Affirm Holdings Inc offers a platform for digital and mobile first commerce. It comprises a point-of-sale payment solution for consumers, merchant commerce solutions, and a consumer-focused app. The firm generates its revenue from merchant networks, and through virtual card networks among others. Geographically, it generates a major share of its revenue from the United States.
